MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD6 postcode area of Melrose. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:22pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:36am on Saturday, 27 February 2021
